oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Landwirtschaft und Kunst: ART-Gerechte Haltungen
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rytkönen, H.
Meyer-Glitza, P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The project Agriculture and Art (Landwirtschaft und Kunst) offers the unique opportunities to experience three different forms of art-activities: 1) the platform “art in the house of ecology”, 2) the open studio “burning questions” and 3) the exhibition of posters representing the work of artists concerned with the rural context. All activities are an experiment in the cocperative field of art and sciences – a transdisciplinary vision.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Rytkönen, H. and Meyer-Glitza, P. (2005) Landwirtschaft und Kunst: ART-Gerechte Haltungen. [Agriculture and Art.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
